cab.content: His Britannic Majesty^ Government)(This Document is the Property ofSECRET.OPERATIONS.From::-' General Plumer, Italy.To: -C o I oG oS.,War Office-Handed in at 7..40 p..m. 26.11.17.Received at 12.40 a.m. 2T.R.50 0 R H 8.iThere is no change in the situation. All the hostile local attacks yesterday were repulsed successfully.' The French troops and ours are halting to-day and to-morrow astride the Brenta.. We shall resume our march eastwards on November 28th,s
